thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: Pamela

author: Pamela
title: Pamela
text: I have been very happy with Thrift Books. Lately I am enjoying a resurgence of reading enjoyment, but I don't have the budget to purchase new books. I am a slow reader, so the library is not a great fit. Plus I like to hang on to the books that resonate with me. Thrift Books has been a perfect find. Delivery has been prompt. Note: Pay attention to the notes about the condition of books, as the lower priced volumes will likely be well loved with writing and dog-ears.
